mapper.insert: insert into district (district_id, district_name, city_id, date_created, date_updated) values (#{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dateCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into district
district_id,

where district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT *FROM district WHERE city_id = #{cityId}
